text: For the Father lovesTo my surprise the verb here is φιλεω, not αγαπαω—the Father is emotionally attached to the Son. Well, since we have emotions God must have had them first. God affirms that He has soul (Isaiah 42:1, Matthew 12:18, Hebrews 10:38). the Son and shows Him everything that He Himself is doing; and He will show Him greater works than these, so that you may marvel.
